TaskDescription.Detail: Open a new Excel file, input data, and use VLookUp to get the desired value.

Assist.value: You can designate a variable to contain the opened Excel file. Store in RESULT by default.
Click the Run button to open a new Excel file.
Write a value in the area specified in the Excel file.
Specify the values ​​to be input as an array. Input this.data. (The variable is assigned a value to be Input.)
Input the cell address to start typing. Values ​​are Input from 'A1'.
Click the Run button to check the input value.
Using VLookUp to get the Name value of the row with ID 2.
Input the area with the value you want to search for. Input 'E4', the field with the search value.
Input the search range. Input this.range. (Value: 'A1:C4')
Input the position of the column to get the value from. Input 2 to get the Name value.
Input the target Cell to receive the VLookUp function input. Input 'F4'.
Click the Run button to check the result. (Expected result: RPA)
Using VLookUp to get the Age value of the row with ID 2.
Input the area with the value you want to search for. Input 'E4', the field with the search value.
Input the search range. Input this.range. (Value: 'A1:C4')
Input the position of the column to get the value from. Input 3 to get the Age value.
Input the target Cell to receive the VLookUp function input. Input 'G4'.
Click the Run button to check the result. (Expected result: 25)
Specifies the string to be input. Input 2.1.
Specifies the input area. Input 'E4'.
Click the Run button to change the value. The search value of VLookUp is changed and N/A appears.
Adjust the VLookUp options to solve the N/A.
Input the area with the value you want to search for. Input 'E4', the field with the search value.
Input the search range. Input this.range. (Value: 'A1:C4')
Input the position of the column to get the value from. Input 2 to get the Name value.
Specifies whether to search even if only a partial match is found. Please enable that value.
Input the target Cell to receive the VLookUp function input. Input 'F4'.
Click the Run button to check the result. The Name of 2 most similar to 2.1 in ID appears. (Expected result: RPA)
Adjust the VLookUp options to solve the N/A.
Input the area with the value you want to search for. Input 'E4', the field with the search value.
Input the search range. Input this.range. (Value: 'A1:C4')
Input the position of the column to get the value from. Input 3 to get the Age value.
Specifies whether to search even if only a partial match is found. Please enable that value.
Input the target Cell to receive the VLookUp function input. Input 'G4'.
Click the Run button to check the result. The Age of 2 most similar to 2.1 in ID appears. (Expected result: 25)
